name: Survival driver 2: Heavy vehicles
description: Indie racing project where player drives with heavy vehicles only target to pass tracks under limited time
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 860M Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960M Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Direct x9
